original_text:
who sent his glorious arm of power
    to be at Moses’ right hand,
who divided the waters before them,
    to gain for himself everlasting renown,
korean_text: 그의 영광의 팔이 모세의 오른손을 이끄시며 그의 이름을 영원하게 하려 하사 그들 앞에서 물을 갈라지게 하시고

sentences.original_text: who sent his glorious arm of power
to be at Moses' right hand
who divided the waters before them
to gain for himself everlasting renown
